choices: Ties you down with socks, and beats you up
Glues socks to your hands+feet where you can't hold stuff makes you serve her
Makes you suck on her toe socks
1.content:
You needed to get a job, you never got along with your step mom after your dad died and you decided to move out. The only job that was open was a place at a womens shoe store. Not your first place to work because of your fear, but it was better than spending it with your step mom. Who was evil, hot but insanely evil you've only known her for 6 years you being twenty. You usually flinch when a woman takes off her shoes to reveal socks, toe socks being your biggest fear of all socks thankfully none of the girls you helped with shoes had ever worn them.

The girls never noticed the flinching, but you knew one day a girl would notice. A girl walked in, and you recognized her it was bristol palin, the vice president sarah palins daughter, well she would have been vice president if Mccain had won the 2008 election. She sat down and yelled at you to help her you went over, and she said take off my shoes, so you did, and what you saw made you yelp a little and fall back. Toe socks, bristol was wearing toe socks. You were deathly afraid of girls socks. You weren't afraid of boys just girls, probably because of a babysitter you had who tortured you all the time with all sorts of girly socks.

Bristol noticed your yelp and flinch, of course who wouldn't have of course the store was pretty much empty. Bristol said whats wrong afraid of socks. You thought how did she know then you realized she was joking, and you replied N-no. Bristol then said Oh my god you totally are. She then put her socked foot on your face, and you were terrified, she said if you want this to stop come home with me. You said No, She then kicked you in the face, and after you opened your mouth to say something stuck her foot in your mouth, and wiggled her sock clad toes around. Until you said fine I'll do anything you want, just please stop.

So you left with her, when you got to her house. There was a cage dog bowls, collars and leashes with your name on them. How do you know who I am, you asked. She said your step mom called my mom and said you were looking for a place to stay. Turns out they're old college buddies, she even told me where you worked, she called me later and said I'd be able to control you so I bought this stuff. Then she said go to the shoe store and wear toe socks, and ask to try on shoes, I never knew you would be afraid of my socks. You then thought How how did your step mom know... your thoughts were cut off by bristol saying "Well how should I torture you first"...
1.title: The start of a horrible life

choices: Keeps slapping you until you start to break
She starts punching you in the chest and stomach.
She throws the chair back and starts trampling you.  Maybe in toe socks?!
She's interrupted by a knock at the door, who could it be?
Readers Choice / Something Else
11.content:
Bristol ties you down to a chair, and in a cruel twist she actually uses several pair of toe socks! You are scared out of your mind and you beg her to let you go.

"Please Ms. Palin let me go, please, please..."

She cuts you off with a vicious slap to the face.

"You are my slave now, I own you. And unless you behave I'll bury you in toe socks, not just any toe socks but dirty filthy toe socks!"

This got your attention. You felt a cold shiver of fear tingle down your spine. That would be too horrible to contemplate. As you sat there scared out of your mind Bristol finishes tying you. After she's done she slaps you again.

"Why..."

Slap.

Slap.

"Because I can."

Her perfectly manicured fingernails stroke your cheek before she slaps you again. And again. And again. You're cheeks are reddening and the feel incredibly sore. Then she pulls back her hand for a huge slap and you flinch away and she yells at you, "Look straight ahead bitch! Do you want a toe sock in your mouth?" You whimper and straighten your head and she slaps you full force. She actually catches part of your ear and it rings horribly. She laughs at your painful expression.

"You better get used to pain because this is nothing but a taste of what's going to happen to you!"

What does she have in store for you now?
11.title: Ties you down with socks, and beats you up

choices: She keeps standing on you but makes you worship her socks.
She tramples your face.
Something Else / Readers Choice
113.content:
Suddenly she pushes the chair backward and you fall hard. You're still tied to the chair so the chair goes with you and you hit your head on the floor pretty hard. Luckily it was carpet otherwise you might of had a concussion. Even though your just as helpless as you were before it feels even worse now that your on the ground.

You see Bristol Palin circle you. To your horror she's wearing toe socks!

She sees the fear in your eyes and laughs. Without warning the graceful Dancing with the Stars contestant jumps onto your chest! She knocks the wind out of you. As you try to gasp for air she starts to walk in place on your torso. You groan in pain and she smirks at you as if saying you haven't seen anything yet.

She begins to actually march in place now really increasing the tempo and pressure on your body. Your chest is on fire and just when you think you can't take it anymore she jumps into the air and lands on your gut. Her toe sock covered feet were massacering you! You could feel the bruises start to form on your body and you began to beg for mercy.

"Please... please... it hurts Bristol."

She stomps hard on your belly and says, "Don't ever call me Bristol. I am your Goddess. You will only refer to me as Goddess, understood?"

"Yes *groan* Goddess."

Bristol laughs, drunk on her power over you.

Bristol pauses for a moment, "Hmm what to do next to..."
113.title: Trample Time

choices: Yes... the sock worship continues.
No you bite down by reflex, you're in deep shit now.
There is a knock on the door and you gain a momentary reprieve.
1131.content:
"Hah I know," Bristol Palin announces.

She then marches up your torso again and then balances one one foot. The pressure intensifies and you let out another groan. As your mouth opened to groan she shoved her sweaty toe sock covered foot into your mouth!

"Don't you dare bite down slave or I'll really make you pay."

You're eyes go wide with terror. Toe Socks. In. Your. Mouth. You try to struggle but your still tied to the chair. You began to writhe and panic. You know you can't bite down or who knew what she would do but you had to get the socks out of your mouth. You whimper as she pushes her foot deeper in your mouth. You try with all your might not to bite down but in your blind panic are you successful?
1131.title: Sock Worship

choices: Your step mom!
One or more of Bristol Palin's friends.
11311.content:
You know that Bristol Palin is being serious when she says she can really make you pay. Your mind goes through dozens of possible hideous tortures you could suffer. And so with an enormous effort of will you force yourself not to bite down on the rancid toe socks that were being pushed into your mouth.

Her weight was still balanced with one foot on your torso and that pain was pretty intense however most of your thoughts were focused on the violation of your mouth. Bristol was "fucking" your mouth with her sock covered foot! She pushed it in and back out a bit and then in again. Her balance was superb as she fucked your mouth.

"Yeah come on bitch, deep throat my foot. Oooh I can tell you've had practice sticking things in your mouth, are you a little closet fag boy? Haha"

In no way were you gay but her cruel taunts hurt you. You gagged on her foot as she pushed it into the back of your throat.

Your mouth and throat were being violated by the cotton creation that you dread more than anything in the world. The horrible toe sock. You're not sure why you have such a loathing for it but you do and the fact that she is mouth raping you with it makes everything twice as bad. You plead with your eyes to stop this torture but Bristol just drinks in your suffering and laughs.

As she keeps pounding your tonsils you hear a knock on the door... Who could it be?
11311.title: Yes... the sock worship continues.

113111.content:
Bristol smirks at you and then gets off of your body. You sigh with relief, thankful that her weight was off of you and that those abominations calls toe socks were no longer fucking your mouth.

Bristol opens the door and in walks your step mother! Your step-mother is insanely hot but also a very evil bitch. When your father died she had taken over as your only parental figure. Even though you had been 14 at the time she made you have a babysitter, a babysitter who abused you with toe socks every night. It had been the start of your phobia and ultimately had led you to this nightmare.

Your step-mother looks down on you and laughs, "I see Ms. Palin didn't waste any time."

"Mom... how could you do this to me? Get me out of here."

She rolled her pretty hazel eyes and shook her head, "Boy, I only married your father for his money. You were always useless. When he died so soon after the marriage I couldn't just kick you out. What would people say? I would of been crucified in the court of public opinion. But I resented you, resented having to live in the same house as you. You're a worthless pathetic nobody. Oh it wasn't all bad I'll admit, when I got those babysitters to come over when I was out on the town, I gave them specific instructions on how to handle you..."

In shocked horror you realize it was your step-mom who had made those babysitters torture you with toe socks! She was the cause of it all! You are so angry and upset you could barely form words.

"Put simply this my vengeance for having to put up with you. For the rest of your life you will serve Bristol Palin!"

Bristol turns to your step-mom and says, "Hey you want to try abusing him yourself? Or do you just want to watch what I'm going to do to him everyday for the rest of his life?"
113111.title: Your step mom!

11311112.content:
You came to in relative darkness. Your entire body was sore from the abuse you had taken. The broken nose, the bruised testicles and the violated ass... just thinking about it again made you want to weep. After taking inventory of your bodies damage you realize you're strapped down tight to the ground. Above you is some type of foam that is see through from your end but not see through from the other end. In addition to that there are foot shaped intentions everywhere.

You realized you were looking up *through* some type of special carpet that was the floor. They had tied you to the floor itself! Worse yet is that you had a raunchy pair of toe socks stuffed in your mouth so you couldn't even make noise to try to call attention to yourself.

Which brings you to the voices, there were several female voices nearby. You could also distantly hear music. Bristol must be throwing a party with all her female friends!

Now the only question is... did Bristol tell them about you? Are they going to trample you completely unaware your down there suffering, or will they know about it?

113112.content:
As she hears the knock she pushes hard one last time causing her foot to gag you harshly before she removes it and steps off of you.

You are immediately grateful. It was getting difficult to breathe and your chest was aching terribly.

"This better be good, I hate being interrupted," Bristol said.

She marched to the door and then swung it open... who was it?
113112.title: One or more of Bristol Palin's friends.

1131121.content:
"OMG, Selena its been ages," Bristol exclaims.

They exchange hugs as you look to see who had arrived. To your shock it was none other than the hit star of Wizards of Waverly! Selena Gomez the Latin teen sensation.

(Author's note... here are some recent up to date pictures of the star. http://www.dailymail.co.uk/tvshowbiz/art... )

Selena walks in and says, "Oh wow what is going on Bristol?"

Bristol smiles smugly, "This is my little slave, I'm just teaching him who is boss. Want to help?"

Selena looks down at you and sees the pain your in. She always seems nice on TV maybe she'll be nice now? She looks down at you and smiles... like a cat who has just found a plaything.

"Are you sure Bristol... you remembered what happened last time."

Bristol sighed, "Yeah I know, you broke my last slave. But that was a year ago, plus I don't really like this slave very much. If you break this one I won't mind too much. Still try not to break him too fast he's not suffered much at all!"

These words sent your fear soaring to even greater heights. Selena had "broken" a slave? Bristol didn't mind if you were going to break to?

"Please.... just let me go."

The girls look at each other and laugh as if that was the funniest thing in the world. Selena mocks you, "Aww poor little baby slave wants to be let go. And I haven't had any fun yet!"

Bristol gets her laughter under control and asks her friend, "So what do you want to do to him first?"
1131121.title: Selena Gomez

"I think I'll walk on him for a bit, I do love hearing slaves scream."

Bristol rolls her eyes, "I knew that was coming."

Selena watches you as you watch her boots get closer. She then slowly takes the first step onto your prone body. Her heel digs into your skin painfully as she adds more and more weight to it. Finally she actually transfers all her weight as she steps up onto your body. You give out a hiss of pain. Selena laughs, "That's already hurting you? Oh I feel bad for you then... NOT."

She twisted her heels ripping into your skin. You're hiss of pain turned into a whimper. And then a scream as she stomped down right on your sternum.

Bristol shakes her head in amusement. "Seriously they are annoying."

"Go ahead, I'm going to be at this for awhile."

You hear those words and dread fills your core. She's going to be at this for awhile? Her skin was leaving your skin pockmarked, it had drawn blood and you knew you had to have bruises on you now. How could she be so cruel? Bristol comes over with her gag... what is it?

1131122.title: Other friends.

choices: You want her to try to help you... even at the cost of her smelly feet.
You tell her no, it is not worth the risk if her feet really smell that bad.
11311221.content:
It was none other than Debby Ryan!

Bristol ran over and gave her a big hug.

Bristol gushed, "Oh wow you look great in that dress, it must have cost a fortune!"

Debby blushed prettily, "Oh this was nothing, its just the latest fashion in Paris."

Debby then looked over at you.

"Oh My God Bristol! Not Again!"

Bristol rolled her eyes, "Its no big deal slaves are a dime a dozen."

Debby put her hands on her hips, this is wrong Bristol, its wrong. Look at how bad off he is. You got to untie him and let him up! And you better do it now."

Bristol looked at her friend. "I don't have to do anything but... I'd be willing to wager something for his freedom." Your heart surges in eager anticipation. You might have a shot of getting out of here!

Debby Ryan looks at Bristol cautiously... "What do you have in mind."

"We settle this in a friendly contest. If you win, you can set him free. However if I win... hehe well you have to HELP me torture him. And I've been to enough sleep overs to know that my feet are NOTHING compared to how smelly your feet get!"

Debby looked taken aback. "How rude Bristol. Its not my fault I was born with stinky feet."

Bristol laughed, "Do you remember the time that mutt sniffed your socks and went into seizures? Sure it was just a tiny dog but I don't know anyone else whose socks can do that!"

Debby reddened. "Fine fine your right I've got smelly feet. Ugh Bristol you put me in a bad position. It would be an absolute nightmare for this poor guy if he had to smell my feet. It might even damage him permanently."

Bristol smirks, "That's fine I'll just keep playing with him then." She then walks over to you and stomps you hard in the chest. Debby screeches, "Oh my God Bristol! You play mean."

The beautiful Debby Ryan walks over to you and looks down. "You poor helpless guy. Look I'll try my best but if she wins... its going to be horrible for you. I'm a woman of my word, if I lose I'll torture you in anyway Bristol says. I'll let you decide, do you want me to try to help you even though you know the consequences if I fail or do you want me to just leave?"
11311221.title: Debby Ryan

Debby blushes prettily and says, "Oh you know I'm sensitive about it, don't be so mean!"

Bristol laughs, "Oh come on you know I'm just joking around with you... you might have stinky feet but you're my BFF."

You really hope that Debby wins the contest and you wonder... what contest will it be?

Something Else Happens / Readers Choice
1132.content:
With those words she then marches onto of your face! You only had a bare instant to turn your head to the side before her foot crashes down on your head.

The object of your horror, those cursed toe socks were on your face! Her right foot was on your cheek and the left foot was on the side of your head. The pain warred with your phobia, you couldn't be sure what was worse.

And then Bristol Palin, daughter of the first female VP started to march on your face and you knew what was worse. It was the pain. Her feet were pounding your head into the floor. Her feet were jamming your cheek into your teeth, you could feel blood on the inside of your mouth.

"This is so much fun!"

You were in so much pain you just wanted her to stop. How could she be so cruel?

"Isn't this fun? Isn't it?"

You of course couldn't answer but she seemed to enjoy taunting you.

"Aww does it hurt? Poor little baby, you're gonging to have to get used to this. Yes you are, yes you are."

The pain had you on the verge of tears but you tried to fight them to salvage your pride. But it got worse. She then started to STOMP on your head. Was she trying to kill you? On one lift of her foot you cried out, "PLEASE"

Bristol laughed and finally got off of your head.

"Please? Such a polite wittle slave."

Her voice ended its faux baby talk voice and it dropped into a severe whisper. "You little bitch, I own you. I'm going to break you. And after I break you, I'm going to make you my foot licking, toe sock sniffing bitch for the rest of your miserable life."

Those words chilled your soul. You felt bubbles of fear rip through your body as you struggled to fight the tears of terror that were forming. You knew if you started bawling she will have totally broken you. She would have made you weep and beg for mercy so quickly, you're self-esteem would never recover. She saw the quiver of your lip and the scariest smile you have ever seen formed on Bristol Palin's face.

Will you break here and now?
1132.title: She tramples your face.

11323.content:
Bristol was really getting into breaking you down when her phone rang! She answered the phone with a curt, "What?" You couldn't hear the other end of the conversation but her demeanor changed and she responded, "A party? Yeah absolutely I'm in. Uh huh. OK, hey... do you think it would be all right if I bring a little play toy?"

Your mind was racing you knew that meant you!

"Well its actually a human, well a sub human. I've torturing him right now," she went on with the conversation.

Whoever was on the other line must be a friend of Bristol Palin! Would they let her invite a human doormat to the party?
11323.title: Something Else Happens / Readers Choice

info.brief_description: Bristol finds out your fear, and uses it to dominate you. Will give gp for additions
info.description:
If you don't know what she looks like this is her http://i.huffpost.com/gen/203964/BRISTOL-PALIN.jpg

In this story her attitude is bratty, spoiled, very demeaning to you like insults baby talk, taunting.

You work in a womens shoe store. Bristol finds out your fear makes you go home with her. Does wahtever she wants to you, your defiant at first but she breaks you make sure you make it known when she breaks you. She can do whatever you can think of except no farting, poop, pee, or but insert. Butt squashing is okay though. She can shrink you but it doesn't have to go in that direction. Please keep the story to the fear I'll reveal that in the first chapter, your character never gets over his fear, please keep the person nameless. Keep it to bristol she can have three friends over. If possible make those three selena gomez, demi lovato and debby ryan. Make the chapters at least a paragraph and a half. Try to do proper spelling, I don't care if you mess up on punctuation though. You Can Also Add Bristols Younger Sister Willow to the Mix, which is Recommended,

I will give gp for additions
